## About Me: My name is Trina Hofrenning and I am a student at Macalester College. I am studying Economics & Applied Mathematics and Statistics, and also have minors in dance and classics. This website will serve as a blog/place to share interesting R tidbits and projects that I am working on. Enjoy!
